name: The LastAntibody
description:
The LastAntibody was created inside GMTK Game Jam 2021 - Theme: Joined Together

*Play as an antibody 

*Binds to the pathogen

*Bring it to the phagocyte to eliminate the infection.

*Reborn on a Lymphocyte B and do it again

*** CONTROLS ***

WASD -> Move the antibody

Left/Right ArrowKeys  -> Rotate

Up/Down ArrowKeys -> Zoom

Credits:

Made by Matheus Viegas - @nexo_mv

Music Credits: Cleyton RX - Underwater - https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
